title: 后台一直报错，貌似是数据库的问题
author: passage-of-time
txt_content:
后台一直提示
[11:37:43 WARN]: java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_CORRUPT]  The database disk image is malformed (database disk image is malformed)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.DB.throwex(DB.java:374)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.NativeDB.prepare(Native Method)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.DB.prepare(DB.java:123)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.<init>(PrepStmt.java:42)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:404)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:399)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:383)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:164)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:198)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:51)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:49)
>
[11:37:43 WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

求解修复方法

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
coreprotect查询插件数据库损坏
根本不用像楼上那样修复,又不是什么重要的直接删除数据库(插件目录-coreprotect-database.db)重建就行

replies.author: passage-of-time
replies.txt_content:
wcy13033496327 发表于 2017-2-12 12:35
